mainBoard.name: Scholar of the Lost Trove
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Scholar of the Lost Trove enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant, sorcery, or artifact card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If an instant or sorcery spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, those must be paid to cast the spell.
If you cast an artifact spell this way, it won’t be exiled if it would be put into your graveyard this turn.
If you wish to cast the target card, you must cast it while the triggered ability is resolving. You can’t cast it later in the turn.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, you may cast target instant, sorcery, or artifact card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If an instant or sorcery spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.
mainBoard.name: Juggernaut
mainBoard.originalText:
Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

rulings.text: If Juggernaut can't attack for any reason (such as being tapped or having come under your control that turn), then it doesn't attack. If there's a cost associated with having it attack, you're not forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to attack in that case either.

mainBoard.text:
This creature attacks each combat if able.
This creature can't be blocked by Walls.

mainBoard.flavorText: The impact sent the soldiers scattering—then something came out of the crater.
mainBoard.name: Meteor Golem
mainBoard.originalText: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

mainBoard.flavorText: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.
mainBoard.name: Ancestral Statue
mainBoard.originalText: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Ancestral Statue’s ability is mandatory. If Ancestral Statue is the only nonland permanent you control when its ability resolves, you must return it to its owner’s hand.
The triggered ability doesn’t target any permanent. You choose which one to return as the ability resolves. No player can respond to this choice once the ability starts resolving.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Just as a broken relic can be mended, a shattered history can be made whole."
mainBoard.name: Archaeomender
mainBoard.originalText: When Archaeomender enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"
mainBoard.name: Erratic Visionary
mainBoard.originalText: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

rulings.text: You can’t do anything in between drawing a card and discarding a card, including casting the card you drew.

mainBoard.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"That's the third time this month it's exploded on site. Maybe we should switch to something a little less defective."
—Kerrin, archaeologist
mainBoard.name: Lightning-Core Excavator
mainBoard.originalText: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Lightning-Core Excavator: It deals 3 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 3 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."
mainBoard.name: Thirst for Knowledge
mainBoard.originalText: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

rulings.text: You can discard either one artifact card or two cards which may or may not be artifacts. If you really want to, you can discard two artifact cards.

mainBoard.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher
mainBoard.name: Chromatic Sphere
mainBoard.originalText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.

mainBoard.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned."
"And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.
mainBoard.name: Hedron Archive
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription
mainBoard.name: Aether Spellbomb
mainBoard.originalText:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
mainBoard.text:
{U}, Sacrifice this artifact: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: History has buried its treasures deep.
mainBoard.name: Buried Ruin
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
